communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm sick of being rejected by women, it's all because of feminism and how they think they're better than us. The dating scene is rigged against men, and it's time someone spoke out against it.
narratives.p_intro: You think you're so much better than me with your 'equality' and your 'respect'? Newsflash, women don't actually want equality, they just want to control men.
